Lok Yang TengLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 18 Nov 2018Withdrawal is from 55. You can still use CPF money for housing, investment, education and healthcare payments.https://www.cpf.gov.sg/Members/Schemes/schemes/retirement/withdrawals-of-cpf-savings-from-550 comments0
